segments.text: Hi everyone! Today, we're gonna talk about food quality and safety.
It's super important to know what you're eating, right? Like, is it healthy?
So, first things first, always check the expiry date on packaged foods.
Expiry date is like, the last date you should eat that thing.
And, you know, look for any signs of spoilage. Like, if it smells weird, don't eat it!
Next up, hygiene! Before cooking or eating, wash your hands properly.
Use soap and water, and scrub for at least 20 seconds. It's a must!
Also, when you're buying fruits and veggies, try to choose fresh and seasonal ones.
They're usually more nutritious and less likely to have harmful chemicals.
So yeah, just be mindful of these things, and stay healthy!
